snap(-60,-60,45)

sky(60,80,120)
fog(0,250,250)
ground(50,60,70)
polys(40,50,60)

fadefrom(3500)
density(7)
lightson()

name(A Police Station)

nlaps(2)

set(48,0,0,0)p
set(20,0,5600,0)p
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(10,0,16800,0)p
set(14,0,21350,0)pt
set(14,0,21350,-90)pt
set(10,0,22400,0)p

------------------------
1st way:
set(23,0,25200,180)
set(26,0,24100,0)pr
set(23,0,32000,0)
set(30,0,32600,180)pr
set(10,0,34800,0)p
set(21,0,40400,180)
chk(42,0,42550,0)
set(17,0,44950,0)pt

chk(42,1750,44950,90)
set(33,1750,44950,90)pr
set(17,3500,44950,-90)pt
set(15,3500,40400,0)p
set(15,3500,34800,0)p
set(20,3500,29200,180)
set(26,3500,24900,180)pr
set(23,3500,26400,0)

set(23,3500,15800,180)
set(10,3500,13000,0)p
set(10,3500,7400,0)p
set(10,3500,1800,0)p
set(26,3500,-900,180)pr
set(23,3500,-800,0)
set(23,3500,-8400,180)
set(10,3500,-11200,0)
set(10,3500,-16800,0)
set(14,3500,-21350,180)pt
chk(40,1750,-21350,90)

2nd way:
chk(42,0,42550,0)
set(15,4550,44950,90)p
set(15,10150,44950,90)p

3rd way:
set(10,-4550,21350,90)p
chk(40,-6800,21350,90)
set(32,-2325,21350,90)
set(14,-9100,21350,90)pt

set(44,-9100,31500,180)
set(43,-9100,37100,0)p

fix(41,-9100,43000,-1000,0)s
set(44,-9100,48300,0)p

4th way:
set(10,4550,21350,90)p
set(23,5350,21350,90)

set(23,17461,-8650,-90)
chk(40,11200,-9210,90)
chk(40,1750,-21350,90)

set(21,0,-5600,180)p
set(10,0,-11200,0)p
set(10,0,-16800,0)p
set(14,0,-21350,90)pt
set(14,3500,-21350,180)pt
set(10,3500,-16800,0)p
set(10,3500,-11200,0)p
set(23,3500,-8400,180)
set(14,3500,-12250,0)pt
set(13,8050,-10730,-60)p
set(23,10850,-9210,90)
set(26,0,-9500,0)


cars:
set(3,850,400,45)
set(3,-850,400,-45)
set(3,-550,-1100,-45)
set(3,550,-1100,45)

maxl(22,-15000,-23500)
maxt(15,62400,-12600)
maxr(22,56400,-23500)
maxb(17,-23400,-12600)
